name: Deep in the ocean (xicoizquierdo)
description:
I made a game for Ludum Dare 48 inspired by the ocean. You have to go deeper and deeper in the sea without disturd the animals. You have the help from the oxygens. You can not go deeper too fast or go upper! Always down! Be careful with the oxygen bar. Have fun!!

Please rate this on:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deeper-in-the-ocean
